subject: Re: Parameter in JUnit!
msgSnippet: Hitliubo, ... certain ... to ... some ... JUnit promotes test isolation. Test should not depend on other tests, or on the order they are run. Passing
messageBody:
Hitliubo,

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "hitliubo" <hitliubo@...> wrote:
>
> It is known that Junit doesn't support pass some parameters to
certain
> testmethod or return sth., right?


> However, I want to write certain class which is at setUp() method
to
> make different testclass sharing the same instaince and passing
some
> parameters. Is this possible?
>

JUnit promotes test isolation.
Test should not depend on other tests, or on the order they are run.

Passing parameters from one test(case) to another is against JUnit
nature.

Regards, Jan
